result.name: turnover-information
result.notes:
This is provided by companies for the purpose of calculating the plant protection products and biocides Annual Charges payable by approval holders each year.  These datasets are electronic spreadsheets which record the annual turnover declarations we receive from each company as part of the Annual Charge setting process. The declarations which companies are required to make are returned in either paper or electronic from
Several hundred companies provide turnover information each year.
The dataset contains financially sensitive data for each company.

organization.name: health-and-safety-executive
organization.title: Health and Safety Executive
organization.description:
The Health and Safety Executive (HSE) is the national independent watchdog for work-related health, safety and illness. It acts in the public interest to reduce work-related death and serious injury across Great Britain’s workplaces.

HSE is an executive non-departmental public body of the Department for Work & Pensions

http://www.hse.gov.uk/

result.title: Turnover information.

extras.value: Not due to be released Contains personal and sensitive data. Will be reviewed in the light of demand and prioritisation.
